channel.title: HELP! How do i change the exp on non-Combat skills!
channel.description: [size=14pt][b]How do I change the exp for runecrafting, fletching, woodcutting, mining, fishing, and all the non-combat skills? Thanks -Jimmi[/b][/size]

item.title: HELP! How do i change the exp on non-Combat skills!
item.dc:creator: @DivineSouls DivineSouls
item.description:
@DivineSouls wrote:

I don’t know what is your base, so I’m taking a shot in the dark right now.

Look for the methods that support that skill, each skill has it’s own number corresponding with it.
Attack = 0
Defence = 1
Strength = 2
Hitpoints = 3
Ranged = 4
Prayer = 5
Magic = 6
Cooking = 7
Woodcutting = 8
Fletching = 9
Fishing = 10
Firemaking = 11
Crafting = 12
Smithing = 13
Mining = 14
Herblore = 15
Agility = 16
Thieving = 17
Slayer = 18
Farming = 19
Runecrafting = 20

When an action is performed while doing a skill, xp is added. The method should look like this.
addSkillXP(x,x)
If you don’t have the method, here it is:

public boolean addSkillXP(int amount, int skill) { if (expLock) { return false; }

Now after an action is performed, you want to add skill xp, so If i said
addSkillXP(1000, 10);
I’m saying add 1000 experience to the fishing skill (10 = fishing).

Read full topic
item.source: HELP! How do i change the exp on non-Combat skills!
